"I can help you," she finally answers. "Oh yes, dear brother -- I can help you out more than you can possibly imagine!"

What next?

Finally you found your crush and managed to talk to her a bit. She was dressed as a frat boy. Even your twin sister was there dressed as a fairy.

You socialized and danced with people from your class till the sunset. You talked with your sister and she said she had seen your outfit somewhere before.

It was dark and Kathrine had called everyone into the living room. She had set up a bubbling cauldron in the center of the room and candles all around. She herself was dressed in her cheer leading uniform, you all had given her crap for cheating earlier. She started to chant and churn the cauldron, and you all laughed. She was really into Halloween. 11421.content:
You decide on going as an Evil-Looking Gothic Vampire woman. You go to your girlfriend and ask for her help with this. She's surprised by your idea for your costume.

"Are you sure that you want to go as that?" She asks.

"I'm sure Kyra," you say to her.

She shrugs."Okay. Do you want some help getting ready for the party later?"

You thought on this for a bit. "Sure. That would be nice." You told her.

"Okay!" Kyra cheerfully says. "I have an idea for my costume as well. There's some things we'll need to get for your costume."

Some time later, after shopping for some stuff for both your costume and your girlfriend's costume, you're at your house. Kyra hadn't told you what her costume was yet, and she had just finished helping you with yours. She had you keep your eyes closed the entire time sense she wanted to surprise you with how you looked with the costume finished.

"Okay, you can open your eyes now." you girlfriend said.

You did and gasped. Kyra had gone all out with your costume. You were wearing black, silk stockings on your arms and legs; breast forms on your chest for the illusion of breasts; a black silk bra and black silk panties; and a long, black, silk gown. The gown went all the way to the floor, and it had long sleeves that stopped at your wrist. The middle of it hugged you waste. Your face was covered with makeup to make your skin look like a milky white, you lips had dark; blood-red lipstick on them, you had fake fangs on your teeth that made them look pure white, and your eyes, which were a dark grey color, had black eyeshadow around them. Finally, you were wearing a wig that made it look like you had thick, long, dark red hair that rested on your shoulders.

"Oh my..." You whisper. You were stunned with how you looked. You looked like a gorgeous woman, who happened to be a vampire.

"Do you like it?" Kyra asked, nervous.

You were still speechless, so you nodded. This made her smile.

"Great, I'll go put on my costume." She said with a grin. "In the meantime, your twin sister said that she wanted to help you with the heels."

"Wait, heels?" You ask.

"Of course." Your girlfriend says. "They'll help finish the look." With that said, she left the room.

Then, your twin sister Megan, walked in. She was dressed in an angel costume. "Wow. Kyra went to town on you." She said, admiring the result of your costume. "She did a fantastic job."

"Yeah, she definitely did." you agreed.

"Okay, lets get started." Megan said.

You were still practicing walking in heels when Kyra walked in. She was also dressed as a vampire, but she was wearing a simple black, sleeveless, dress. (Also made of silk. Kyra had an obsession with silk.)

"Okay," she said to you and your sister. "Lets go."

With some help, you managed to get downstairs and got outside. The three of you started your trip to Kathrine's house to join the party.

"Thanks." She said to you. "You look great."

You entered the party. You were having a fun time when Kathrine was saying something strange. There was a flash of light and the 3 of you blacked out...

"Bob, wake up!" You heard a voice.

You woke up and saw...
11423211.title: Fox Anthro

114232112.content:
...Kyra. Except she looked different. She was quite a bit taller. She used to be a little under 5ft tall, but now she was towering at an even 7ft. Her arms and legs were longer, and her fingers were also longer. Her gown now looked like it was made of actual gold, and the fake elven jewelry that came with the costume now looked real. Her elf ears were now her actual ears, her skin was now a golden honey color, her hair was now long, thick, and smooth; it had become an amber color and was gently touching her shoulders. Her eyes were now pools of emerald green, her eyebrows were thin and crescent shaped, and her eyelashes were very long, and delicate looking. Finally, her voice was now soft like a whisper, but crystal clear, and had a beautiful musical tone to it, and seemed to smoothly flow like a river.

"Are you okay?" She asked you with concern.

"I think so." You say, then your eyes go wide when you heard your voice. It was now a soft, gentle, female voice. You look at yourself and notice that you were now a female fox anthro. Your entire body, from your feet to your neck, was covered in short, soft, scarlet fur. Except for your feet and hands, which had black fur instead. Your feet were still human shaped, except had the padding on the bottom of them that was typical for animal paws. Your hands had a similar change to them, but they were still functional human hands nonetheless. The wig you were wearing was now your actual hair, which was also a scarlet color, but also had black streaks in it. The small fox ears were now your actual ears, and you now had better hearing, smell, and sight. Your felt you tail moving. Your waste was thinner, you arms and legs were slimmer, and your hands smaller. You were also smaller. Instead of 5ft, 11in, you were now about 4ft, 6in. "W..w..w..what's happened?" You ask, whimpering. Tears were forming in your eyes. You were very, very scared of this sudden change.

Kyra then picked you up like you weighed nothing. and held you in her arms. "Shh." she cooed, while stroking the top of your head. "It's okay. Everything will be alright." The soothing, gentle in her voice was very calming and you were now quiet. Your arms were around her neck, and your head was resting on her left shoulder.

"Where's my sister?" You ask.

Before Kyra could answer, you heard a bark. You turned and saw you sister Megan, who was now an actual wolf.

"Megan!?!?" You say with shock. "Is that you?" You were relieved when the she made a happy bark in confirmation.

You then heard a laugh and saw Kathrine. "Awe. Isn't that sweet?" She said with an amused tone in her voice.

"What did you do to us?" You ask her.

"I just cast a spell that turned everyone into their costumes." She explained. "It's clearly outdone itself." She said.

Megan growled at her.

"Bad girl!" Kathrine scolded her.

Megan made an angry barked at her in defiance.

"Well you should've chosen a different costume if you really feel like that." Kathrine said. "But sense I'm feeling merciful tonight, here you go." She said as she spoke a few strange words and a light briefly enveloped Megan before going away. "There, now your able to shift between your wolf form and your human form." Kathrine said.

Megan shifted to human. "Thanks." She said. Megan was wearing a sweatshirt, sweatpants, and a pair of socks.

"Your welcome." Kathrine said.

"Why did you to this to us?" Demanded Kyra

"Everybody at that party deserved it, All of them ignored me, and never paid me any attention until I became popular, which only happened because of a spell." Kathrine explained with a smirk. "This is payback. Although the three of you got the best treatment from the spell because you three were the only ones who were actually nice to me."

"Can it be undone?" You ask with a whimper.

"Normally yes, the others will be back to normal, but a small side effect of the spell is that it can be permanent for some people." She explained. "So, I can't undo the changes to you three. Although the odds of it becoming permanent is actually about 0.6%, so you guys got lucky."

"Lucky!?!?" Megan growled. "You call that lucky!?!?"

"Megan!" Kyra snapped. "That's enough." Surprisingly enough, your sister stopped. She whimpered a bit and shifted back into a wolf and laid down. "Is there anything you can do for us Kathrine?" Kyra asked her.

"Yes." She replied. "I can make your lives easier. So as a parting gift, I'll alter your lives to fit your new appearances." Kathrine then cast another spell, and you guys found yourselves in a beautiful mansion.
114232112.title: ...Kyra. (girlfriend)

12.content:
Hmmm ... sports? Yeah, for some reason that one really catches your attention.

You've never been much of an athlete. Always clumsy and awkward in gym class, you've spent a lot of time wishing you could've been a superstar. Even if it's only for a cheesey costume party, it sure would be neat to play the role of a popular jock for a night.

But which sport to choose? You want to still be creative and original. If everyone else got the same invite you did, that means 20% of the guests at this party are bound to be showing up as basketball players, football quarterbacks, and the like.

Hmmm ... What kind of sports-themed costume would really stand out?
12.title: Hey now -- You're an all-star!

choices: you (jockey), sister (horse's front), & best friend george (horse's end)
121.content: For some reason you were drawn to this one. It was a costume of a jockey riding a horse. But you noticed it required two other people to complete the costume: One for the horses back legs and midsection, one for the front legs and head, and one to sit as the jockey. But who could you go with and how...
121.title: A horse racing jockey.

choices: It was the costume you ordered
It was a complete different costume
It was a gymnast costume but female
123.content: You had checked via the internet for an olympic gymnast costume and it was due to arrive for today. You sat there and waited until there was a knock at the door, you opened and received a box from a man on the door step and he told you that this was your costume. You opened the box to find that
123.title: An Olympic gymnast.

1233.content:
"Your kidding me, this is a womens uniform!" you said. (http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3223/3149...)

"Haha, companies are stupid!" Leslie said over hearing your outburst.

"Well I don't have time to find a better one, so I'll have to go with this." you said. "Or I have a wig you can borrow if you wanna stick with that."

"Well what is it that you have?" you ask out of curiosity.

"Well you have to use it if I tell you." she laughed.

Do you use hers?
1233.title: It was a gymnast costume but female

125.content:
You ponder the possibilities before arriving at a very peculiar one: a sportscaster. You aren't athletic, but you thoroughly enjoy the arts and drama. This is the perfect choice. Now one question remains, who would you try to imitate?

You could the round John Madden, with his distinctive accent and funny banter, or maybe Joe Buck, today's version of the ideal sportscaster. It would be a tough choice. You are built and have a nice physique, so it would make sense to be Buck. But Madden is such an icon, you just had to be him. Now to buy the ensemble. You sneak out of the house and get into your dad's new Lamborghini. (You just got your permit and there is no way your parents, or your nosy sister, for that matter, would let you out.)

Zooming out in the beautiful California evening, the breeze moves your flowing dark-blond hair. Your favorite band is beaming on the stereo as you pass your girlfriend's house. She lives just a few blocks from the costume store. As you turn the corner, you cell-phone rings. It is...
125.title: Madden, Buck, the Lambo, and the Phone

choices: The Creature from the Crimson Coral Reef
Cthuluhura -- That Which Man Was Not Meant to Know
13.content:
Oooo! You've always been fascinated by monsters. Sure it's a bit clichéd ... but monster costumes can be real classics, too. And if you pulled it off right, you just KNOW you could be the hit of the party with some truly fabulous costume.

So many monster to choose from, though ... and just one party.

Which one will you be?
13.title: The Monster Mash

choices: TV tough guy Mutt, the Bail Bondsman.
14.content:
A celebrity! That's a great idea, you think. You've never been the most popular kid in school, so why not show up for the party dressed as one of the most popular people on the planet?

But which celebrity should you choose to emulate?
14.title: When you're a celebrity, it's adios reality!

15.content:
As you finished reading the invite your sister walks up behind you. Your sisters name was Leslie and was one of the more popular people at your school. You two always got along decently and almost never argued but when you did it would get really bad.

"Hey Bob want to do a group costume with me Kathrines costume party," she says

"Um let me think about it, i might do it with someone else."

who should you choose...

"I can go with you" you say to your sister

"Great cause i had a wonderfully fun idea. I was thinking we could go as siemese twins that are connected at the hips,"

"i dont know about that one leslie"

what should you do

1511.content:
You agree with leslies idea and she gets all excited hugs you and runs up stair to her room to prepare the costume. Now you dont have to worry about it anymore and she can handle all of it.

You decide to take a walk. You walk down your road to see what kathrine is doing to prepare for the party. You come to her house and look in her window. She is getting really into it. She has fake cobwebs everywhere and a steaming pot in the middle of the room with skeletons and jars of weird objects on everyshelf. You suddenly get a weird chill up your spine and shiver. You shrug it off and walk back home.

When you get home you ask leslie if you can see the costume yet and she says no and tells you to not even get the idea.

Later....
1511.title: Leslies idea

15111.content:
Its about time to leave for the party and leslie comes up to you and blind folds you. She leads you up the stairs to what seems to be her room and hands you some clothes and tells you to put them on.

When she unblindfolds you look down and you see wearing....
15111.title: The Day of the party

The exact opposite, female version of what you're wearing.
151111.content:
"What gives, sis?" you ask. "These are just normal guy clothes."

"You never were very patient," Leslie answers. "Wait and let me put on my half of the costume."

She leaves the room for what seems an eternity, only to come back wearing...
151111.title: A Let Down

151112.content:
You look down and see bright pink sweatpants, and your right is half sweatpants half jeans and your sisters leg is on the jean side. You look over at your sister who is sharing a leg of the pants with you and see that she is wearing one of you zip up sweatshirts.

"Perfect, now put this on," she says as she gives you a pink braw and a lime green tank top. "good now lets walk over there and ill get the wigs" she says. She reaches into a box that has two wigs in it and one of them has hair that looks like your hair and one that looks like leslies hair. You put on the long blonde hair wig and she puts on the medium length brown wig and you walk over to the mirror. you both look rediculous but who cares its a party. She gives you some tissue paper to stuff your bra with and you both walk out of the house and head to the party.

1511121.content:
You both walk aqwardly into the house and Kathrine greets you, she is wearing witches costume and you tell her that it suits her personality. She says, "well bob im pretty sure that pink clothes suit you well too," and she looks towards your butt and you realize she isnt making a comment on the color but the word thats written on your butt. Then all you can do is hope that no one recognizes you.

You look around and see all your friends and your girlfriend. Your friend Joe is wearing nothing but a black speedo and a bow tie, apparently he is a male stripper. Ryan as always trying to be the life of the party is Joe's partner in crime, the play boy bunny. You cant help but laugh. Then you look at your grilfriend and see that she is like a hermanphordite. She emphasized that fact buy stuff her braw and her pants so it looks like she has a penis.

Kathrine announces that the punch is ready and tells everyone to grab a cup. Then she starts to say something in a weird language and everyone gets nocked out.

when you come to

when you come to you try to get up but you just cant seem to stand, or move that much, you can only move one leg. You lookdown to find that your actually connected to your sister. You look over and see a boy laying there instead of you sister. you try and move him and he stirs then, you try and pull off your wig and find that it wont budge. Your voice comes out of the boy next to you and says, "leslie what are you doin," you say, "im not leslie your supposed to be her." Then you scream at the sound of your voice

You look and in your hand is a drink that wasnt quite finished. you look around and everybody else had finished theirs. what happens next.

A two-tone dress for two: half black and naughty, half white and innocent.
15112.content:
You sneak up into Leslie's room to take a peak inside, hoping to find the Siamese Twins costume she's been putting together for the party. Leslie said you weren't allowed to see it until the day of the party ... but patience has never been a virtue for you.

Whew! Leslie's nowhere to be seen. You creep into her room. She must have put the costume in her closet. Opening the closet door you see...

151122.content: You pick up the costume and look at it and think to yourself that it might be fun to try it on now....

1511222.content: Leslie comes in and asks you what you are doing and you tell her you're admiring her work but you want to suggest another idea for the party and the costume. You ask her what she thought about going as female twins dressed as one naughty and one nice. She seems to think that
1511222.title: Leslie comes in

choices: On the way - a mysterious bracelet was on the floor
15112221.content:
She seems to think this is a good idea and you both go down to the local costume store which was packed full of these costumes. Leslie decided that she wanted to be the nice and innocent twin and you were to be the naughty and sort of slutty one. You found two costumes down the ying and yang aisle. Leslie had choosen what looked to be a very innocent looking costume but she still wanted to look hot do she picked a sexy costume out. Yours seemed to be mroe daring which was the idea. You had chosen a costume which consisted of a long brown wig and a mini skirt with a very tight see through top, it included a bra but the shop keeper said for better results use it without the bra and a giant pair of fake breasts. You got home and the party was due to start in 30 minutes so you both get ready and meet in leslies room.

You had put the costume on rather quickly and listened to the shop keepers advice however you still looked funny. You walked in on leslie and found that she had put her costume on too and was standing there with her fake breasts on and clothing that wasnt very revealing. You both head off to the party and as these were a twin sisters costume you were linking arms and looked quite similar from afar.
15112221.title: good idea

You seen the bracelet lying on the ground and swiped it up thinking that it would go with your costume really well. You looked at leslie and she had a look and said it would go with your costume more than hers. You decide to put the bracelet on and you feel kind of funny as waves of energy are pumped into your body. You scream in terror as the bracelet starts to glow and leslie looks back at you and tries to get this bracelet off.

Suddenly you feel your mind changing becoming more feminine, but not only that you were thinking more about boys than you should be. You knew how to manipulate them into doing things for you and you felt naughtier than ever before. You looked at leslie and grinned seductuvely and kissed her on the cheek and said its all fine. All of a sudden another glow sucumbed your body and it started to change to fit the costume, the fake breasts were melting into your body your waist was growing and you felt very horny with this new body. Your new breasts pushed even further out so that they could be seen rather enjoyably by anyone who looked. Your ass had grown proportionally to your breasts and was nearly seen beneath your mini skirt.

Leslie looked at you in shock and you wished that you could give her the body she was portraying which suddenly the bracelet reacted to and change her also. Her body became proportionally bigger than usual stopping at the same size of yours but could not be seen as she wore conservative clothing. You changed her mentally also using the bracelets power and as exact opposite twins headed to the party, or did you?

choices: Kali, the Four-Armed Hindu Goddess of Destruction.
1512.content:
"I don't know about that one, Leslie," you tell your sister. "If we're literally joined at the hip all night long, what happens if one of us has to use the restroom?"

Leslie rolls her eyes and laughs at you.

"Well, if you're going to do a group costume with me you're going to have to pick something we can together," she says.

You think for a moment and then suggest the two of us dress up as...
1512.title: Something Else

choices: A Pair of Giant, Fuzzy Dice
152.content:
You tell Leslie that if you've got to spend the party "grouped" together with someone in themed costumes, you'd rather it be your girlfriend Debby.

"No offense, sis," you say.

Leslie huffs and stalks off with her nose in the air. Damn! You hadn't wanted to hurt her feelings. Ah, she'll get it over. Besides, what could she possibly do for revenge anyhow?

Rather than brooding over Leslie's bruised ego, you quickly call Debby and ask if she'll do a group costume with you for the party.

Debby agrees and suggests you two go as...
152.title: Go with Debby

1523.content: She suggested a pair of giant fuzzy dice, you tell her you would be over in a little bit and hop in your car. Once you get there you see that she has decided to make the costumes. She had two boxes out and had several different colors of what looked like fur, to choose from. You asked her where she had gotten the fur from. She had been cleaning out a thrift store earlier in the week that was closing and they allowed her to take the some stuff home. There were three colors you could choose from.
1523.title: A Pair of Giant, Fuzzy Dice

15233.content:
"I want pink," Debby said.

"Well I am thinking black." you replied

You couldn't decide so she pulled her little sister in for the tie breaker and of course any 5 year old girl would choose pink. But you did like how the pink was so soft. So you two go to work making the costumes and glueing the fur onto the boxes. By the time you were done it looked great, you two looked hillarious in it.

It was almost time for the party so you threw the cotume in the car and headed toward the party. You got out of the car and threw on the costume. It was very aqward to walk around in.

You walked in and
15233.title: Fuzzy and Pink

153.content:
"No offense, sis," you tell Leslie. "But I was kinda thinking about calling up my buddy Joe. Maybe he and I could put together a good two-person costume."

Leslie rolls her eyes.

"You and Joe are so immature when the two of you get together," she snorts. "You'll just come up with something stupid. Oh, well ... see you at the party!"

Fine, you think. Let Leslie be in a bit of a huff. You'll have more fun without being joined at the hip to her all night long.

You call up Joe on the phone and ask his opinion.

"Sure, Bob!" says Joe. "I've even got the BEST idea for a costume."

Joe suggests the two of you go as...
153.title: Go With Joe

1531.content:
"A dinosaur?" You repeat. You weren't as thrilled about the idea as Joe obviously was.

"Yeah, I have the costume all set up. I'll bring it over now!" Joe says. Then you hear the phone click.

"Guess we're going as a dinosaur." You say to yourself.

A ten minutes later, Bob was knocking on the door. You walk over, and let him inside. Bob had a huge smile on his face. "Here it is!" Bob gladly held up the costume. It was defiantly something you hadn't expected.
1531.title: A Dinosaur.

15311.content:
You stared at the costume for a moment, and glanced over at Joe. "It that what I think it is?"

"Yeah! Its a two-headed T-Rex! I made it myself!" Joe proudly stated. Despite what it might look like, he actually did a great job. Joe after all was an excellent artist, and designer. He often helped build the costumes used in the school plays.

"It looks...great. You did a good job." You manged to say.

"Thanks! Hey, do you want to try it on. We should make sure it can fit both us in there?" Joe excitedly asked.
15311.title: A two-headed T-Rex

choices: You and Joe put the costume on, nothing happens at first...
You and Joe put the costume on, the costume is no longer just a costume
153112.content:
"Uh...let's wait for the party. I don't want to spoil the surprise for my sister and her friend." You say.

"Good idea." Joe nods. Joe may be a great artist, but he is very naive.

You and Joe spend the rest of the time helping your sister and her friend get ready. They ask you several time to put on the costume so they can see, but you stick to your excuse. Finally, it was time to leave for the party.

All four of you pile into your car, and you drive off to Kathrine's place. You arrived relatively early; plenty of time to get into your new costume. As you look around the neighborhood, their are very few cars. 'Why did we have to come so early?' you say to yourself. 'No one else from school is here yet.'

As you approach the house, Kathrine opens the door, and invites you in. She is dressed as Queen. You and Joe excuse yourselves, so you can put the costume on.
153112.title: You all go to Kathrine's house

choices: An Electrical Plug and a Wall Socket.
154.content:
"Sorry sis," you tell Leslie. "But I'm sorta leaning towards asking Katherine if she'll do a two-person costume with me."

"What?" Leslie asks as her jaw drops. "But I thought you and Katherine didn't get along? Didn't you say she was always kinda mean to you?"

"Yeah," you shrug. "But she invited me to her party, so maybe she's trying to bury the hatchet. And I sorta figured if she'd do a joint costume with me, maybe that'd help prove there's no more bad blood between the two of us."

"Good luck," Leslie says. "I'll see you at the party then!"

You call up Katherine and thank her for the invite. Surprisingly, she actually thinks it's a swell idea doing a two-person costume with you. She even suggests the two of you dress up as...
154.title: Go With Katherine

choices: "I guess I may as well have fun with it."
1542.content:
... a two-headed ogre. Or "ettin" as your girlfriend would call it. You make your way to Katherine, who appears to give off a quite fiendish smirk as you enter her room. That grin is not one you have good memories with...

"Hello, Bobby. I see you don't have a costume of your own, so you agreed with my costume idea?" You see her even more excited as she looks you up and down. "I hope I got your size right"

Of course, it wouldn't matter much, as all you'd need is a large tunic for both of you and maybe some fake ogre teeth.

But of course she went the extra mile and got a bodysuit for two. Four pant legs so you could stand side-by-side, a sleeve for each, defined muscle padding stitched in... But you then notice the large breasts that are also part of the costume. This is beginning to sound like a bad idea.

"Now, ya gotta strip to your underwear for it to fit right" she says, excitedly panting as she explains it. "I hope you like it, because this WILL be your costume for the night"

It doesn't sound like she's giving you any choice, so you say...
1542.title: A Two-Headed Ogre.

choices: Yeah, not so fast, love. Here comes the chloroform.
15422.content:
"Bobby, you promised"

"Yeah, that was before you asked me to put on fake tits!" you fumed as you said this. "And I'm pretty sure this is all just some fetish to you!"

Now she started getting uppity, ignoring your accusation, "I had all this prepared, and you're just going to pussy out? What will you wear for the party, huh?"

Seriously? Is she really expecting you to still come to her party even after this? The door is right there, so you do the sensible thing and leave.
15422.title: "No. Just no."

info.brief_description: You get invited to a holloween costume party, and you transform into what your costume is
info.description:
Your name is bob, you get invited to a costume party on halloween, you are 16 and you have a twin sister, you have a girlfriend, and a few freinds that are invited also. On the invite are general groupings of costume ideas.

(try and spell correctly, i dont wanna see any copied storylines, otherwise anything goes, except try not to make sex scenes grafic if you go there)
